channel.title: CVE Feed for NI -- IO Trace Tool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NI -- IO Trace Tool

item.title: CVE-2024-5602|2024-07-23T13:15:50.508Z -- ni -- io%20trace%20tool
item.description:
A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to a missing bounds check in the NI I/O Trace Tool may result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted nitrace file.
The NI I/O Trace tool is installed as part of the NI System Configuration utilities included with many NI software products.â€¯ Refer to the NI Security Advisory for identifying the version of NI IO Trace.exe installed. The NI I/O Trace tool was also previously released as NI Spy.
